header.tech-Lab: Strategic Technology Laboratory \n (Raymand System Ezma Group)
header.vHospital: Health Technology Management \n (Raymand Equipment System Company)

discover.discover-intro: The Raymand Group consists of three companies, each of which aims to revolutionize traditional systems in their respective fields. These companies, relying on innovative methods and cutting-edge technologies, seek to provide solutions to the challenges facing the country's industrial, research, clinical, and healthcare laboratories.
discover.raymand1-des1: Supply, import and production of laboratory equipment and consumables based on GPO and value chain principles
discover.raymand1-des2: Supply and import arm of specialized equipment from reputable global brands
discover.raymand1-des3: By using the GPO model, the company enables cost reduction and increased productivity in the supply chain of industrial, research, and clinical laboratories in the country.
discover.raymand2-des1: Intelligent management and implementation of quality assurance systems for specialized, research and clinical laboratories
discover.raymand2-des2: Implementation and auditing of international standards such as ISO 17025 and ISO 15189, etc.
discover.raymand2-des3: Designing the structure of laboratory processes, developing SOPs and training human resources
discover.raymand2-des4: Consulting on purchasing, installation, calibration and validation of equipment
discover.raymand2-des5: Resource management including human resources, consumables, and capacity planning for the production of laboratory services
discover.raymand2-des6: Increasing productivity, accuracy, and efficiency in laboratory operations
discover.raymand2-des7: Providing laboratory, research and administrative services
discover.raymand3-des1: Smart management of health services based on modern technologies
discover.raymand3-des3: Providing smart solutions for all health units
discover.raymand3-des4: Designing operating models and organizational structures
discover.raymand3-des5: Virtual hospital and innovative developments in health services (including prevention, pre-hospital, hospital, post-hospital)

home_page.hero-sec1: A new development in laboratories and health services based on strategic technology at Raymand Holding
home_page.hero-sec2: Raymand Group was established with the aim of creating an integrated and technology-based ecosystem in the supply chain, management and service delivery. At Raymand Group, we strive to transform the current standards of health and laboratory services in the country with a systematic, scientific and value-based approach. By utilizing advanced technologies and modern management strategies, our goal is to develop a localized model of global best practices in laboratory services management, specialized equipment supply chain and health management in Iran.
home_page.newsBlog: Stay up to date with our latest news and insights.

news.title1: We look forward to meeting you at the laboratory equipment exhibition with the latest products from major foreign companies.
news.title2: Get to know Raymand's laboratory services in the fields of soil, water, microbiology, livestock and poultry, food, and medicine.
news.title3: Soon, the latest developments and news in the field of health and medicine will be available to you through this section.

generalInfo.missionDesc: At Raymand Group, we help industries and society operate more accurately, healthily, and efficiently by managing and developing a network of laboratories, providing specialized health services, and supplying modern equipment.
generalInfo.visionDesc: Raymand; a leader in creating an integrated network of laboratories and health services in Iran and the region, with global standards and sustainable innovation.

container1.description: Raymand Strategic Technology Laboratory Complex was formed with the mission of improving quality, health, and safety in the country's industries and health to introduce a new concept of integrated laboratory services to the Iranian market.

container2.description: By gathering a collection of specialized laboratories in the fields of food and beverage, water and environment, soil and agriculture, petrochemicals and related industries, and health, Raymand has provided an innovative platform to meet the diverse needs of organizations, industries, and research centers.
container2.title: Drawing inspiration from the management model of international companies

item1.description: All laboratories operate as a coherent network; this structure enables the provision of fast, accurate, and coordinated services.
item1.title: Integrated and intelligent management

item2.description: All processes are designed and implemented based on international standards such as ISO/IEC 17025 to ensure that the results achieve the highest level of credibility and global acceptance.
item2.title: Global standards serving Iranian customers

item3.description: Raymand is not just a laboratory service provider; rather, it offers solutions to improve quality, reduce costs, and increase customer productivity with a consultation-based approach.
item3.title: Innovation in service delivery

item4.description: Utilizing experienced experts in various laboratory and industrial fields has enabled us to respond to our customers' complex needs with accuracy and speed.
item4.title: Outstanding scientific and management team

item5.description: Our model is designed based on collaboration with reputable laboratories across the country, to transform Raymand into a national laboratory platform.
item5.title: A vast and expanding network

container1.description: Specialized testing, consulting and registration services for plant health, crop protection and seed innovation.
container1.title: Agricultural science and crop protection services

container2.title: Raymand Agricultural Science Services with expert knowledge,
container2.title10: And these services are developed through knowledge exchange between specialized centers in the country.
container2.title2: Testing and regulatory advice to plant health product manufacturers,
container2.title3: It offers crop protection, agricultural technology, plant breeding, and seeds.
container2.title4: In a complex and dynamic environment,
container2.title5: We support customers throughout all stages of agricultural chemical registration.
container2.title6: Field and laboratory studies for the safety and effectiveness of new products,
container2.title7: It is the core of our activity and registration is carried out by our team of experts.
container2.title9: Provides services to manufacturers of biocides and other chemicals

container1.description: Performing extensive testing daily with advanced techniques for diagnosis, monitoring, and confident treatment decision-making.
container1.title: Innovative, cost-effective clinical diagnostic services available to all patients

container2.title: By performing hundreds of thousands of clinical diagnostic tests every day,
container2.title2: Raymand Clinical Diagnostic Services Laboratories are working hard
container2.title3: To ensure that every patient, everywhere,
container2.title4: Have access to the most specialized and innovative techniques for diagnosis, monitoring, and treatment.
container2.title5: Logistical expertise and daily sample collection and delivery network,
container2.title7: And it maintains the standard of quality and access to innovation in all regions.

container1.description: Providing concrete, rebar and building materials testing services to ensure safety and sound engineering decisions.
container1.title: Raymand Concrete and Rebar Laboratory - Accurate and Standardized Tests

container2.title: Raymand Concrete and Rebar Laboratory is equipped to provide accurate, reliable, and standards-compliant testing services for a wide range of construction materials. We specialize in testing concrete, reinforcing steel (rebar) and related materials to ensure structural integrity, safety, and compliance with industry specifications. Whether you are in the design phase or during construction, our laboratory provides accurate data to support sound engineering decisions.

container1.description: Raymand helps promote health and protect the environment by providing specialized water, air, soil, and waste testing, along with professional consulting and monitoring.
container1.title: Raymand Laboratory Services for Health and Environment

container2.title: A clean and safe environment is a prerequisite for health and quality of life.
container2.title2: Raymand, by providing market-leading laboratory services,
container2.title3: Monitoring and advising a wide range of industrial companies, environmental consultants, contractors, retailers and government officials contribute to this.
container2.title4: Our services include testing water, air, soil, waste and other products.
container2.title5: To assess their quality and impact on health and the environment.

container1.description: A national network of advanced laboratories to perform food safety, composition, authenticity, and traceability tests.
container1.title: Raymand Food and Feed Laboratory Quality and Safety Assurance

container2.title: Raymand is a leading food and feed laboratory group in Iran, employing a wide range of advanced analytical techniques to support the increasing quality and safety standards of its customers. The group has established a national network of food laboratories and competence centers that annually conduct a large number of tests to determine the safety, composition, authenticity, origin, traceability and purity of food products. Therefore, Raymand offers the widest portfolio of food testing products and makes this unique offering available globally from each of its laboratories using optimized processes, logistics and information technology.

container1.description: Leading provider of DNA sequencing, genotyping, synthesis and bioinformatics for pharmaceuticals, diagnostics, food, agriculture, biotechnology and research.
container1.title: Raymand Genomics Advanced DNA and Bioinformatics Services

container2.title: Raymand Genomics represents the genomics division of Raymand Scientific Group. With centers in Iran and abroad, Raymand Genomics is a leading international provider of DNA sequencing services, genotyping services, DNA synthesis products, and bioinformatics services for the pharmaceutical, diagnostic, food, agricultural, biotechnology, and research markets.

container1.description: Advanced and accurate diagnostic services for large animals in support of veterinary care, herd health and agricultural productivity.
container1.title: Raymand Large Animal Laboratory Specialized diagnostics for livestock and horses

container2.title: Our large animal laboratory offers specialized diagnostic tests designed to meet the unique needs of large animals such as cattle and horses. Equipped with advanced technology and a staff of experienced professionals, we provide accurate, timely results to support veterinary care, herd health management, and agricultural productivity. Committed to quality and reliability, our services help ensure the health and well-being of your valuable animals.

container1.description: Comprehensive and reliable pet testing with fast results to support veterinarians and the health of your beloved animals.
container1.title: Raymand Small Animal Laboratory Specialized diagnostics for pets

container2.title: Our small animal laboratory offers comprehensive diagnostic tests designed specifically for pets, helping veterinarians provide accurate and timely care. From routine blood tests to specialized tests, our state-of-the-art facilities ensure fast, reliable results and support the health and well-being of your beloved animals. We are committed to working with veterinary professionals to provide the best possible support for your pets' medical needs.

container1.description: Strategic Technology Laboratories (Raymand Group) provides pharmaceutical, biological, cosmetic, and health services with an integrated and standardized network.
container1.title: Pharmaceutical, biological, cosmetic and health industries

container2.title: Pharmaceutical, Biological, Cosmetic and Health Laboratories Strategic Technology Laboratory (Raymand Group) is a first-tier business partner for outsourcing pharmaceutical and biological services. Raymand Groupâ€™s laboratory network services cover all the tests required in the production chain of related products, which are provided by the best and most specialized pharmaceutical, chemical, biotechnology, medical equipment and cosmetic laboratories. By creating a national laboratory network and implementing a quality assurance system, Raymand Group provides services of the highest standard in an integrated manner.

container1.description: Specialized testing and analysis for the poultry industry to prevent disease, increase productivity, and ensure food safety.
container1.title: Raymand Poultry Laboratory Accurate diagnosis for poultry health

container2.title: Our poultry laboratory specializes in diagnostic testing and analysis tailored to the poultry industry. We provide accurate and timely results to support poultry health management, disease prevention and overall production efficiency. With state-of-the-art equipment and expert staff, we help poultry farmers and veterinarians maintain poultry fertility and health and ensure compliance with food safety standards.

container1.description: The Soil Science Laboratory provides accurate analytical services, assesses soil quality and fertility, and provides scientific solutions to improve sustainable agriculture.
container1.title: Soil science laboratory

container2.title: The Raymand Group wants to contribute to healthy, sustainable and sustainable agriculture and growth.
container2.title2: As an independent partner, we enable agricultural and food industry players to improve soil and crop health and fertility, performance and profitability.
container2.title3: Our analytical and decision support services are vital tools to help transition to more sustainable agricultural practices.
container2.title4: These services lead to positive environmental and social impact.

container1.description: Comprehensive testing for drinking water, industrial and environmental uses using advanced and accurate methods.
container1.title: Raymand Water Analysis Laboratory ensures water quality and safety

container2.title: Our water analysis laboratory offers comprehensive testing services to assess water quality for a variety of applications, including drinking water, industrial uses, and environmental monitoring. Using advanced analytical techniques, we deliver accurate and reliable results to help ensure safety, compliance with regulatory standards, and sustainable water management. Trust us to support your water quality needs with precision and expertise.
